greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Simple self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: List each block of n^2 - n + 1 numbers from ((n-1)^3 + 2*(n-1))/3 + 1 to (n^3 + 2*n)/3 in reverse order.
comment: In other words, after zero, list each block of A002061(n) numbers from A116731(n) to A006527(n) in reverse order.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9951
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 04 2013
